JobFullDesc:
Elastic is a search company built on a free and open heritage. Anyone can use Elastic products and solutions to get started quickly and frictionlessly. Elastic offers three solutions for enterprise search, observability, and security, built on one technology stack that can be deployed anywhere. From finding documents to monitoring infrastructure to hunting for threats, Elastic makes data usable in real time and at scale. Thousands of organizations worldwide, including Cisco, eBay, Goldman Sachs, Microsoft, The Mayo Clinic, NASA, The New York Times, Wikipedia, and Verizon, use Elastic to power mission-critical systems. Founded in 2012, Elastic is a distributed company with Elasticians around the globe and is publicly traded on the NYSE under the symbol ESTC. Learn more at elastic.co.

Elastic is a free and open search company that powers enterprise search, observability, and security solutions built on one technology stack that can be deployed anywhere. From finding documents to monitoring infrastructure to hunting for threats, Elastic makes data usable in real-time and at scale. Thousands of organizations worldwide, including Barclays, Cisco, eBay, Fairfax, ING, Goldman Sachs, Microsoft, The Mayo Clinic, NASA, The New York Times, Wikipedia, and Verizon, use Elastic to power mission-critical systems. Founded in 2012, Elastic is a distributed company with Elasticians around the globe. Learn more at elastic.co.

As the Recruiting Manager for EMEA Field Operations,  you will lead and grow a distributed team of EMEA sales recruiters. The EMEA sales recruiters work in close partnership with our EMEA sales leaders to enable the growth of our rapidly growing sales teams across multiple EMEA locations. Our EMEA sales recruiters are strategic business partners to our field sales leaders within Elastic and have a direct impact in the continued growth and success of Elastic's EMEA region. What You Will Be Doing:

Hire, mentor, and professionally develop a team of sales recruiters who are responsible for hiring goalsEncourage and lead a team of recruiters to hire exceptional sales talent in a dynamic and rapidly scaling business through consistent mentoring and developmentIdentify process improvement opportunities and champion streamlined practices, workflows, and metrics to measure successAbility to meet standard measurements of success including annual hiring plans and diversity goalsCarry a requisition load to meet business needsWork with EMEA executives and effectively funnel insights to the team, making sure the team has a pulse on the business and adapts quickly to change when necessaryBe a strategic partner to each business unit, and the recruiting leadership team collaborating closely to deliver on our global workforce planCollaborate with peers and the extended team to contribute to the overall recruiting strategyMaintain standardized full-cycle recruiting processes and tools to ensure standard methodologiesEvaluate recruiting efforts to continually improve the quality and quality of talent brought into the organization.Collaborate with hiring managers to ensure familiarity with the recruitment process; share data and progress through quarterly business reviewsCreate and maintain an excellent relationship with internal and external clients to ensure achievement of recruitment goalsLead team’s candidate activity in the Applicant Tracking System (ATS) and partner with Operations and HR Tech teams for tool needs, requirements and improvements.What You Bring Along:
What You Bring With You:
A Bachelor’s degree or similar work experienceKnowledge and success in executing a full-cycle, high quality recruiting process required.Knowledge of reporting, data analysis, and understanding of recruiting metrics.Extraordinary leadership, interpersonal, and written and verbal communication skills with proven ability to take feedback and build strong positive relationships.Proven organizational skills with ability to prioritize and work well in an environment with challenging demands.High EQ and a demonstrated pattern of positively mentoring others around you.Some travel required.Bonus Points:
SaaS Software background Experience using Greenhouse, Tableau, Handshake or SeekoutStrong DE&I experience 
Different people approach problems differently. We need that. Elastic is committed to diversity as well as inclusion. We are an equal opportunity employer and committed to the principles of affirmative action. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender perception or identity, national origin, age, marital status, protected veteran status, or disability status or any other basis protected by federal, state or local law, ordinance or regulation. If you require any reasonable accessibility support, please email candidate_accessibility@elastic.co.Please see here for our Privacy Statement.

Additional Information - We Take Care of Our People

As a distributed company, diversity drives our identity.  Whether you’re looking to launch a new career or grow an existing one, Elastic is the type of company where you can balance great work with great life. Your age is only a number. It doesn’t matter if you’re just out of college or your children are; we need you for what you can do.
We strive to have parity of benefits across regions and while regulations differ from place to place, we believe taking care of our people is the right thing to do.
Competitive pay based on the work you do here and not your previous salary Health coverage for you and your family in many locationsAbility to craft your calendar with flexible locations and schedules for many rolesGenerous number of vacation days each yearDouble your charitable giving - We match up to $1500 (or local currency equivalent)Up to 40 hours each year to use toward volunteer projects you loveEmbracing parenthood with minimum of 16 weeks of parental leave
Different people approach problems differently. We need that. Elastic is committed to diversity as well as inclusion. We are an equal opportunity employer and committed to the principles of affirmative action. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender perception or identity, national origin, age, marital status, protected veteran status, or disability status or any other basis protected by federal, state or local law, ordinance or regulation. If you require any reasonable accessibility support, please complete our Candidate Accessibility Request Form.
